__SqlaTable__.sql:
SELECT
    *,
    CASE
        WHEN user_gender = 'f' THEN 'Female'
        WHEN user_gender = 'm' THEN 'Male'
        WHEN user_gender = 'o' THEN 'Other'
    END AS gender,
    CASE
        WHEN user_level_of_education = 'none' THEN 'No formal education'
        WHEN user_level_of_education = 'b' THEN 'Bachelor''s degree'
        WHEN user_level_of_education = 'a' THEN 'Associate degree'
        WHEN user_level_of_education = 'hs' THEN 'Secondary/high school'
        WHEN user_level_of_education = 'jhs' THEN 'Junior secondary/junior high/middle school'
        WHEN user_level_of_education = 'el' THEN 'Elementary/primary school'
        WHEN user_level_of_education = 'm' THEN 'Master''s or professional degree'
        WHEN user_level_of_education = 'p' THEN 'Doctorate'
        WHEN user_level_of_education = 'other' THEN 'Other education'
    END AS level_of_education,
    CASE
        WHEN user_level_of_education = 'none' THEN 1
        WHEN user_level_of_education = 'b' THEN 2
        WHEN user_level_of_education = 'a' THEN 3
        WHEN user_level_of_education = 'hs' THEN 4
        WHEN user_level_of_education = 'jhs' THEN 5
        WHEN user_level_of_education = 'el' THEN 6
        WHEN user_level_of_education = 'm' THEN 7
        WHEN user_level_of_education = 'p' THEN 8
        WHEN user_level_of_education = 'other' THEN 9
    END AS level_of_education_order
FROM openedx.course_enrollments

-- Note: Unless you save your query, these tabs will NOT persist if you clear your cookies or change browsers.

SELECT * from course_grades

SELECT arrayJoin(range(toUInt64(floor(start_position)), toUInt64(ceil(end_position)))) AS bin,
      start_time,
      user_id,
      video_id,
      course_id
FROM video_view_segments
ORDER BY bin

SELECT course_id,
  display_name,
  user_id
FROM course_block_completion
WHERE completion = 1
ORDER BY course_id, position

SELECT user_id,
  course_id,
  time,
  arrayJoin(range(floor(toUInt64(toUnixTimestamp(time))), ceil(toUInt64(toUnixTimestamp(time) + 120)))) AS timestamp
FROM events
WHERE course_id <> '' and user_id > 0

SELECT time,
  course_id, name, user_id
FROM openedx.events
WHERE event_source = 'browser'
